mapper.select: select tu.id, tu.`user_name`, tu.`password`, tu.real_name, tu.mobile, tu.status, tu.createtime, tu.updatetime, tu.last_logintime from system_user tu where user_name = #{userName}
select tu.id, tu.`user_name`, tu.`password`, tu.real_name, tu.mobile, tu.status, tu.createtime, tu.updatetime, tu.last_logintime from system_user tu where tu.id = #{userid}

SELECT tsr.id AS roleid, tsr.role_name, tsyp.id AS resourcesid, tsyp.icon, tsyp.resources_name, tsyp.resources, tsyp.`resources_code`, tsyc.id AS resourcesid1, tsyc.resources_name AS resources_name1, tsyc.resources AS resources1, tsyc.`resources_code` AS resources_code1 FROM system_user_role tsur JOIN system_role tsr ON tsur.roleid = tsr.id JOIN system_role_resources tsrr ON tsr.id = tsrr.roleid LEFT JOIN system_resources tsyp ON tsrr.resourcesid = tsyp.id LEFT JOIN system_resources tsyc ON tsyp.id = tsyc.parentid WHERE tsur.userid = #{userId} AND tsr.status = 'ENABLE' AND tsyp.status = 'ENABLE' AND tsyc.status = 'ENABLE' AND tsyp.type = 'MENU' AND (tsyp.parentid IS NULL OR tsyp.parentid = 0) AND tsyc.`id` IN (SELECT resourcesid FROM system_role_resources WHERE roleid = tsur.`roleid`) ORDER BY tsyp.sort, tsyc.sort;
